The event fee ${{successResponse.totalPaymentAmount}} could either be send via cheque or be paid through paypal. There is no extra charge to pay using Paypal. No paypal account is required.

Pay by Paypal  -

Pay by cheque - please make cheque Payable to GRBA and mail to P.O.Box 4622, Glen Allen, VA-23058. Early-Bird registration is only available to people who have registered before 30th Sept, 2018 and their cheque must also reach GRBA P.O Box by 30th Sept, 2018.
